meanings.sent1: The praelected team members were already decided before the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The praelected winner of the competition was announced yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The praelected class monitor had a big smile on their face.
meanings.sent4: Her praelected role as the lead actress made her feel both excited and nervous.
meanings.sent5: The praelected captain of the team wore a special badge to show their status.

meanings.definition: To choose or select in advance
meanings.sent1: The committee praelected the new president last week.
meanings.sent2: She praelected her outfit for the party to avoid any last-minute stress.
meanings.sent3: The students praelected their group project partners based on friendship.
meanings.sent4: He praelected his words carefully before the important speech.
meanings.sent5: The coach praelected the starting lineup for the game after a long discussion.
